name: openspiel_shimmy
title: OpenSpiel via Shimmy
description: OpenSpiel games wrapped via Shimmy for PettingZoo AEC API. Supports many classic board games, card games, and abstract games.

game_name.description: Name of the OpenSpiel game to play (e.g., 'tic_tac_toe', 'connect_four', 'chess')

actTimeout.description: Seconds allowed for each agent action

runTimeout.description: Maximum seconds for the entire episode

reward.description: Game-specific reward. Typically: negative = lost, 0 = draw, positive = won

remainingOverageTime.description: Remaining overage time for the agent
